channel.title: Compile.BAT
channel.description:
OK! Hi ppl, im C4td0g, and i need some help with Compile.BAT.OK so first off all, my server works perfectly, apart from my compiler. Runserver.BAT works, my Hamachi network works, portforward... umm it works yeah... however when i click compile (in other words, update) it says: System cannot find the path specified. Starting TestScape server on 0.0.0.0:43594.
Ok, Ok, i know wat some of u r thinking, IT WORKS NOOB!... but it doesnt -.-"... so any help? if i get this started then my Hamachi server will be up and running :D and if u say something got to do with "Setting a new class path" or something, plz explain, coz i dont get it :(

im doing a hamachi dude sry and help me out on my other thread plz

item.title: Compile.BAT
item.dc:creator: @Staccia Staccia
item.description:
@Staccia wrote:

wheres my second rep!!! lol =p you were at about 18 of my noobiest list, then u didnt notice the “fucker” and u moved to 15 but then… Then you did the noobiest thing imaginable well second next to saying ur server is 127.0.0.1, you said "i got another error:Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 thats an unforgivable.[hr][hr][hr]Btw If u want ultra coolio colors use my combile script:@echo off COLOR 04 title WhoGivesAScape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause edited so it would work for ur nooby ass =] btw the COLOR 04 is the color change[hr][hr][hr]And Golden same thing with catdog u have errors for leech protection, just use my source when the next version comes out its WhoGivesAScape i dont add anything

Read full topic

item.title: Compile.BAT
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

That is not an error. That is just a notice to you that the a method that stream uses is deprecated. That method happens to be String.getBytes(String string).

Read full topic

item.title: Compile.BAT
item.dc:creator: @Staccia Staccia
item.description:
@Staccia wrote:

keep with the@echo off COLOR 08 title Rockmyscape compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin/java.exe" server pause BUT Go into “my computer” and click the folder with (C:) and then Program Files and then Java and see what version you have in there, if there isnt any, try the (G:) folder and repeat. if it says JDK1.5.0_07 then change the whole thing to:@echo off COLOR 08 title Rockmyscape compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause
If its in the (G:) file then change to:@echo off COLOR 08 title Rockmyscape compiler "G:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "G:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin/java.exe" server pause Coughrep++Cough

Read full topic
